hero.headline: Better than your bank
hero.description: Get the most out of your money with smart investing products and dedicated financial planning and advice services to build long-term wealth.
hero.footnote: Join over 3 million Canadians growing their money with WealthComplex.

profile: Built for Canadians with guidance from real advisors
Low-fee portfolios designed by a team of experts
mission: Save and spend with up to 5% interest and instant transfers
Crypto trading with regulated custody and transparent pricing

frontend: Responsible, halal, and private credit options
Advice from real humans when you need it
backend: No account minimums or monthly fees
Instant deposits and free Interac e-Transfers
Spend anywhere with a sleek metal card
infra: File your taxes in minutes for free
Clear, transparent pricing on every trade

services.subtitle: Products
services.title: Do more with your money
services.description: Automate your investments, earn industry-leading cash rates, file your taxes, and trade crypto — all inside Canada’s most-loved money app.

about.lead: WealthComplex gives everyone powerful tools to invest, save, spend, and grow their money with confidence. Start with as little as $1 and get a portfolio designed by experts who keep your goals on track.

sections.headline: Investing on autopilot
sections.text: Personalized portfolios with automatic rebalancing, dividend reinvestment, and tax-efficient strategies built for Canadian investors.

sections.headline: Cash that works harder
sections.text: Earn up to 5% interest, send and receive money instantly, and pay anywhere with a sleek metal card that gives you cashback.

sections.headline: Guidance from real humans
sections.text: Talk to real portfolio managers, planners, and tax experts who are on your side whenever you need support.

skills.description: Our technology pairs effortless automation with trusted advice so you can reach every money goal without the guesswork.

cta.title: Start building your future
cta.description: Join the millions of people who trust WealthComplex to invest, save, spend, and grow their money the simple way.

footer.description: WealthComplex is Canada’s leading digital financial company, helping millions invest, save, spend, and grow their money with confidence.

contact.title: Ready to do more with your money?
contact.description: Share a few details and a WealthComplex specialist will reach out with guidance tailored to your goals.
contact.success: Thanks! A WealthComplex specialist will be in touch soon.
